tool_description: Get the lastest vulnerabilities to make sure your apps are secure.
name: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE)
title: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE)

api_list.name: getCVEbetweenDates
api_list.description: Get a List of CVEs between two (2) dates using the format yyyy-mm-dd
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://common-vulnerabilities-and-exposures-cve.p.rapidapi.com/getCVEbetweenDates/2023-05-01/2023-05-05"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "common-vulnerabilities-and-exposures-cve.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://common-vulnerabilities-and-exposures-cve.p.rapidapi.com/getCVEbetweenDates/{startdate}/{enddate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "common-vulnerabilities-and-exposures-cve.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCVEbyCWE

api_list.name: getCVEbySeverity
api_list.description: Get a list of CVEs using a string of "HIGH", "MEDIUM", or "LOW"

required_parameters.name: severity
required_parameters.description: String that can be one of three (3) values: HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW.

api_list.name: getCVEbyName
api_list.description: Returns a specific CVE by name such as CVE-2021-24094.
